entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow early this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
